directive ( service in module ng )

Description

Register a new directives with the compiler.

Usage

$compileProvider#directive(name, directiveFactory);

Parameters

  • name – {string} –

    Name of the directive in camel-case. (ie ngBind which will match as ng-bind).

  • directiveFactory – {function} –

    An injectable directive factory function. See guide/directive for more info.

Returns

{ng.$compileProvider} –

Self for chaining.
